features: INCLUDES One silicone popcorn maker/popcorn popper with handles and a silicone lid, in a signature The Silicone Kitchen reusable cotton produce bag for storage or use at your local farmer’s market or grocery
NON-TOXIC & BPA FREE Each silicone popcorn maker/popcorn popper is made of 100% food-grade silicone meeting FDA and European LFGB standards, BPA free, and free of odor and taste
EASY TO CLEAN Each silicone popcorn maker/popper is dishwasher safe, and is odor resistant
EASY TO USE Each silicone popcorn maker/popper is microwave, dishwasher, freezer and oven safe (up to temperatures of 446° F (230° C)

COLLAPSIBLE FOR EASY STORAGE Each silicone popcorn maker measures 5.7 inch x 7.9 inch (14.5 x 20 cm) when fully expanded, and the bowl collapses to 2.4 inch x 7.9 inch (6 x 20cm) for an easier-to-store size

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Silicone Kitchen Silicone Popcorn Maker As beautiful & functional as your kitchen 100% Food Grade Silicone | Non-Toxic | BPA Free

The Silicone Kitchen Silicone Popcorn Maker The Silicone Kitchen silicone popcorn maker makes easy snacking in just a few simple steps. Whether for an individual serving or for a group, the silicone popcorn maker is ideal for snacks, movie nights, & more. The Silicone Kitchen popcorn maker is non-toxic, BPA free and made with 100% food-grade silicone. Packaged in a beautiful The Silicone Kitchen signature cotton-mesh bag, you can be sure that The Silicone Kitchen popcorn maker is the ideal gift for anyone in your life.

Healthy Snacking in Simple Steps Movie Night made right Whether personal size or for a large group, The Silicone Kitchen Popcorn Maker is the economical & efficient alternative to microwave popcorn bags. Healthy snacking in minutes Enjoy as much or as little popcorn as you would like. Expand the bowl, add your desired amount of kernels, put on the lid, microwave, then enjoy! Collapses for easy storage Dishwasher safe, the silicone popcorn maker is easy to clean and collapses for easy storage, ready for you to enjoy your popcorn maker again & again. Gift-worthy Packaged in a beautiful signature cotton mesh bag, you can be sure that The Silicone Kitchen popcorn maker is the ideal gift.
The Silicone Kitchen Silicone Popcorn Maker

Previous page Easy to clean Dishwasher Safe All The Silicone Kitchen products are dishwasher safe, or may also cleaned with soap and water. up to 445°F/230° C Oven Safe The Silicone Kitchen products are oven safe up to temperatures of 445°F/230°C Air Fryer Safe The Silicone Kitchen baking cups and air fryer liner are perfect for the air fryer. Microwave Safe From The Silicone Kitchen popcorn maker to baking mats, our products are safe in the microwave. Freezer Safe Popsicles, ice cubes, frozen food & more. The Silicone Kitchen baking cups & mats are freezer safe. Next page 1 Dishwasher Safe 2 Oven Safe 3 Air Fryer Safe 4 Microwave Safe 5 Freezer Safe

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this! I bought a 12 lb bag of Snappy's popcorn kernels but it was becoming a pain and a mess to clean up when I would do it in a stovetop pot. I had been eyeing this popcorn maker for a while, wondering if it was going to be worth it.... Let Me Share... it's PERFECT!!! I now make popcorn every night as a snack, no fuss, no mess to clean up, quick easy, SATISFTIED with purchase!!! The only advice I can give, is learn your popcorn to Coconut oil/ butter/ seasonings + TIME Ratio. The first 10 uses I over poured kernels and I got burnt popcorn in the mix. I now learned the ratio I need and I've had yummy fresh popped popcorn EVERY DAY! I am a very happy buyer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy air popped popcorn
reviews.reviewText: This is so easy to use for airpopped popcorn in the microwave. I use it nearly once a day making popcorn for my kids without oil and artificial flavor. It is easy to use, we find 2:30 seconds is perfect. It is easy to clean. Can go in the dishwasher but honestly easier to swish it out. Collapses for small storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes great popcorn
reviews.reviewText: Great product . Got mine this afternoon so much better than microwave popcorn in a bag. Love it . Will probably order another one . Wouldn’t hurt to have more than one around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Popcorn is tasty and pops well
reviews.reviewText: I love this Popcorn Popper! It pops every kernel and tastes great. I absolutely love it. I am diabetic and need to have popcorn that is low calorie without the oil and butter and this satisfies me greatly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This works well. The popcorn is still not as good as when I make it in the stove but better than regular microwave

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Clean up is simple. Doesn't heat up the house like our old air popper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This microwave popcorn maker is lovely, it is very easy to use and makes great tasting popcorn.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great microwave popper
